docs.snippet: The victims on Sunday ranged from 2 to 20, according to the police, leaving family members and friends to grapple with the enormity of the house fire.

docs.snippet: It’s grilling time. Seize the warming days, and make jerk ribs or scallion lamb — even garlic bread or poundcake.

docs.snippet: The photographer Daniel Arnold spent the month of May camped outside the New York City Clerk’s Office, documenting couples getting married in irreverent, wild, untraditional — and sometimes very traditional — ways.
